title: Russian blini with mushroom filling
ingredients: ['For the blini', '480ml milk', '2 eggs', '1 pinch salt', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '250g plain flour', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 tablespoons butter', 'For the filling', '1 onion', '200g mushrooms', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '240ml milk', '2 tablespoons cream', '250g cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'a little bit of minced parsley or dill']
